name: Into the dark (itch) (antqs.studio)
description:
Are you afraid of the dark?
Do you feel alone at night by yourself ? Wish you had a friendly sock-puppet companion?

Conquer your fears and defeat the darkness in this short narrative game, Into the dark.

Play Ben (who's not quite 10) as he ventures through the darkness of his home in search of his parents.
Avoid what's lurking in the shadows and puzzle your way through into the light.

-----

[ x ] Navigate your way through multiple levels using a flashlight
[ x ] Avoid monsters by using different light-sources 

[ x ] Have an epic sock-puppet companion

[ x ] Light puzzle and horror elements

-----

𝙂𝙚𝙩 𝙩𝙝𝙞𝙨 𝙜𝙖𝙢𝙚 𝙖𝙡𝙡 𝙛𝙤𝙧 𝙩𝙝𝙚 𝙡𝙤𝙬 𝙥𝙧𝙞𝙘𝙚 𝙤𝙛 𝙛𝙧𝙚𝙚!
